Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.ml.RegressionDatasetBuilder

  • Packages that use RegressionDatasetBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.ml
    Contains all classes to activate the ML library to use the regression capabilities.

    • Uses of RegressionDatasetBuilder in org.pepstock.charba.client.ml

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.ml that return RegressionDatasetBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.create()
      Creates new regression dataset builder, without any sample.
      static RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.create​(List<Double> x, List<Double> y)
      Creates new regression dataset builder, using the passed data as samples.
      RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.setHidden​(boolean hidden)
      Sets true if the dataset will be created in hidden status.
      RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.setLoadData​(boolean loadData)
      Sets true if the samples will be loaded as dataset data.
      RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.setSamples​(List<Double> y, double starting, double increment)  
      RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.setSamples​(List<Double> x, List<Double> y)  
      RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.setSamples​(HasDataPoints dataset)
      Sets the samples by the passed dataset, DataPoint based, data as source.
      RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.setSamples​(HasTimeSeriesItems dataset)
      Sets the samples by the passed time series dataset, TimeSeriesItem based, data as source.
      RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.setSamplesByDataPoints​(List<DataPoint> dataPoints)
      Sets the samples by the passed DataPoints.
      RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.setSamplesByDates​(List<Date> x, List<Double> y)
      Sets the samples by the passed X and Y values.
      RegressionDatasetBuilder RegressionDatasetBuilder.setSamplesByTimeSeriesItems​(List<TimeSeriesItem> items)
      Sets the samples by the passed TimeSeriesItems.
